law.catch_line: Ballots -- Canvass and declaration of result.
law.text: The Commissioner shall prepare and distribute in advance of the referendum all necessary ballots and shall arrange for the necessary poll holders for conducting the referendum. Within ten (10) days following the referendum, the Commissioner shall canvass and publicly declare the result of the referendum.
law.history: Amended 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 8, sec. 11, effective July 15, 2008. -- Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 347, sec. 11, effective July 14, 1992.
